name: Supernova (itch) (LuinBucket, Memorable Man, Mussio)
description:
In this game, you swap between the Earth and the Moon to defeat the one standing at the center of the solar system, the Sun. Both planets have different stats:

The Earth is bigger and slower but deals more damage, while the Moon is faster and smaller, but has weaker firepower compared to that of its counterpart.

The objective of the game is to destroy the red star and save the solar system!

Controls:

Keyboard
hold/press Left click - Shoot

Right click - Swap between Earth and Moon

WASD or ARROW keys - Movement

Gamepad

hold/press Y, B or R2 - Shoot

A or X - Swap between Earth and Moon

Left stick - Movement

Supernova was developed in the span of 3 days.

We made it for the Global Game Jam UADE 2022.
